description: N8N workflow for Visa2Any automation platform
name: Vaga Express Analytics Dashboard

data.query:
SELECT 
  DATE('now') as report_date,
  COUNT(*) as total_active_subscriptions,
  SUM(CASE WHEN plan = 'BASIC' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as basic_count,
  SUM(CASE WHEN plan = 'PREMIUM' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as premium_count,
  SUM(CASE WHEN plan = 'VIP' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as vip_count,
  SUM(amount) as total_revenue,
  AVG(amount) as avg_order_value,
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'FULFILLED' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as successful_completions,
  ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN status = 'FULFILLED' THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END) * 100, 2) as success_rate
FROM vaga_express_subscriptions 
WHERE status IN ('ACTIVE', 'FULFILLED')

SELECT 
  country,
  consulate,
  COUNT(*) as slots_detected_today,
  SUM(CASE WHEN booking_successful = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as successful_bookings,
  ROUND(AVG(response_time_minutes), 2) as avg_response_time,
  ROUND(AVG(advance_days), 1) as avg_advance_days
FROM vaga_express_slot_history 
WHERE DATE(offered_at) = DATE('now')
GROUP BY country, consulate
ORDER BY slots_detected_today DESC

SELECT 
  DATE(created_at) as date,
  plan,
  COUNT(*) as sales_count,
  SUM(amount) as revenue
FROM vaga_express_subscriptions 
WHERE DATE(created_at) >= DATE('now', '-7 days')
GROUP BY DATE(created_at), plan
ORDER BY date DESC, plan

SELECT 
  vs.plan,
  COUNT(vh.id) as total_opportunities,
  SUM(CASE WHEN vh.booking_successful = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as successful_bookings,
  ROUND(AVG(vh.response_time_minutes), 2) as avg_response_time,
  ROUND(AVG(vh.advance_days), 1) as avg_advance_days,
  MAX(vh.offered_at) as last_opportunity
FROM vaga_express_subscriptions vs
LEFT JOIN vaga_express_slot_history vh ON vs.id = vh.subscription_id
WHERE vs.status IN ('ACTIVE', 'FULFILLED')
GROUP BY vs.plan
ORDER BY vs.plan

body.subject: ðŸ“Š Vaga Express - Dashboard Executivo {{ new Date().toLocaleDateString('pt-BR') }}

data.columns: date, basic_sales, premium_sales, vip_sales, total_revenue, slots_detected, successful_bookings, conversion_rate, avg_advance_days, created_at
